org.chemicalmozart.model.implementations.reactionrules

Class PickOneRR

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chemicalmozart.model.implementations.reactionrules.PickOneRR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReactionRule

    public class PickOneRR
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReactionRule
    This ReactionRule is used to pick a Degree in the temporary solution and move it to the main solution. It also create a GarbageRR to remove the Temporary Bar from the main Solution This rule disappears once it has react.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.user.ReactionRule

        ReactionRule.Multiplicity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PickOneRR()
      The constructor is used to set the type of the element we want to match in the subsolutions _temporaryBar and _barInCreation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object[] computeResult()
      It just returns the chosen DegreeImpl into the parent solution and a GarbageRR to remove the temporary solution.
      It must also put back the BarInCreation into the concerned solution because due to the reaction, it will be consumed.
      boolean computeSelect()
      The computeSelect always succeed
      SubSolution<SubSolutionElements> get_temporaryBar() 
      ReactionRule.Multiplicity getMultiplicity()
      This is a one-shot rule
      void set_temporaryBar(SubSolution<SubSolutionElements> _temporaryBar) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • computeResult

        public java.lang.Object[] computeResult()
        It just returns the chosen DegreeImpl into the parent solution and a GarbageRR to remove the temporary solution.
        It must also put back the BarInCreation into the concerned solution because due to the reaction, it will be consumed.
